titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: CDS V6-2-1 Type 011 - Emergency Care CDS - Specification

entry.p: Data Group: CDS V6-2-1 Type 001 - CDS Interchange Header

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 001 - CDS Interchange Header

entry.p: One per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange
Data Group: CDS V6-2-1 Type 003 - CDS Message Header

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 003 - CDS Message Header

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange

p.b: One of the following options must be used:

entry.p: Data Group: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005N - CDS Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

p.b: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Net Change Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005N - CDS Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set re cord submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
Data Group: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005B - CDS Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

p.b: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Bulk Replacement Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005B - CDS Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.b: To carry the details of the Patient Pathway.
To carry the Identity of the Patient. See Note: S3 in Commissioning Data Set Business Rules.
One of the following DATA GROUPS must be used:
Must be used where the Commissioning Data Set record has been anonymised
Must be used where the NHS NUMBER STATUS INDICATOR CODE
Must be used for all other values of the NHS NUMBER STATUS INDICATOR CODE
To carry the characteristics of the Patient for an Emergency Care Attendance.

entry.p: Data Group: MENTAL HEALTH ACT LEGAL STATUS

p.b: To carry the patients Mental Health Act Legal Status.
To carry the Patient's General Medical Practitioner and the General Practice details.

entry.p: Data Group: EMERGENCY CARE ATTENDANCE LOCATION

p.b: To carry the details of the Emergency Care Attendance location.
To carry ambulance details relating to the patients arrival at Emergency Care

entry.p: Data Group: EMERGENCY CARE ATTENDANCE ACTIVITY CHARACTERISTICS

p.b: To carry the characteristics of the Emergency Care Attendance.
To carry the details of injuries.
To carry patient clinical history details.
To carry the details of the Service Agreement.
To carry the details of the Care Professionals active during the Emergency Care Attendance.

entry.p: Data Group: EMERGENCY CARE DIAGNOSES (SNOMED CT)

p.b: To carry the details of SNOMED CT coded Clinical Diagnoses.

entry.p: Data Group: EMERGENCY CARE INVESTIGATIONS (SNOMED CT)

p.b: To carry the details of SNOMED CT coded Clinical Investigations.

entry.p: Data Group: EMERGENCY CARE TREATMENTS (SNOMED CT)

p.b: To carry the details of SNOMED CT coded Procedures.

entry.p: Data Group: REFERRALS TO OTHER SERVICES

p.b: To carry the details of referrals to other services.

entry.p: Data Group: DISCHARGE FROM EMERGENCY CARE

p.b: To carry the details of discharge from Emergency Care.

entry.p: Data Group: RESEARCH AND DISEASE OUTBREAK NOTIFICATION

p.b: To carry details of any Research and/or Disease Outbreak Notifications

entry.p: Data Group: CDS V6-2-1 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer

entry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service. Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange
Data Group: CDS V6-2-1 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer

p.b: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

p.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer

entry.p: One per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange
